comments.body: same as hdfs3 - please add a comment as to why this is linux-only, and what it might take to get it building elsewhere.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@  number: 0
  # This package is a dependency of libhdfs3, which is primarily used with HDFS on Linux.
  skip: True  # [not linux]

test:
